mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM takku_order o JOIN takku_funding f ON o.funding_id = f.funding_id WHERE f.store_id = #{storeId} AND o.status = '결제완료' AND TRUNC(o.purchased_at) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT NVL(SUM(o.amount), 0) FROM takku_order o JOIN takku_funding f ON o.funding_id = f.funding_id WHERE f.store_id = #{storeId} AND o.status = '결제완료' AND TRUNC(o.purchased_at) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM takku_funding WHERE store_id = #{storeId} AND status = '진행중'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM takku_funding WHERE store_id = #{storeId} AND status = '준비중'
SELECT * FROM takku_store WHERE user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT TO_CHAR(o.purchased_at, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, COUNT(*) AS orderCount, NVL(SUM(o.amount), 0) AS revenue FROM takku_order o INNER JOIN takku_funding f ON o.funding_id = f.funding_id WHERE f.store_id = #{storeId} AND o.status = '결제완료' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(o.purchased_at, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY month

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.product_name AS label, COUNT(o.order_id) AS value FROM takku_order o INNER JOIN takku_funding f ON o.funding_id = f.funding_id INNER JOIN takku_product p ON f.product_id = p.product_id WHERE f.store_id = #{storeId} AND o.status = '결제완료' GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY COUNT(o.order_id) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.product_name AS productName, COUNT(*) AS rePurchaseCount FROM ( SELECT o.user_id, f.product_id FROM takku_order o INNER JOIN takku_funding f ON o.funding_id = f.funding_id WHERE f.store_id = #{storeId} AND o.status = '결제완료' GROUP BY o.user_id, f.product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ) re INNER JOIN takku_product p ON re.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY rePurchaseCount DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT t.tag_name AS label, COUNT(*) AS value FROM takku_order o INNER JOIN takku_funding f ON o.funding_id = f.funding_id INNER JOIN takku_funding_tag ft ON f.funding_id = ft.funding_id INNER JOIN takku_tag t ON ft.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE f.store_id = #{storeId} AND o.status = '결제완료' GROUP BY t.tag_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN age BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN age BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN age BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' ELSE '50대 이상' END AS label, COUNT(*) AS value FROM ( SELECT u.user_id, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, u.birth)/12) AS age FROM takku_user u JOIN takku_order o ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE o.status = '결제완료' ) GROUP BY CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN age BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN age BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN age BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' ELSE '50대 이상' END ORDER BY label
SELECT u.gender AS label, COUNT(*) AS value FROM takku_user u JOIN takku_order o ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE o.status = '결제완료' GROUP BY u.gender

SELECT age_group, gender, tag_name FROM ( SELECT inner_query.age_group, inner_query.gender, inner_query.tag_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY age_group, gender ORDER BY cnt DESC) AS rn FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, u.birth)/12) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, u.birth)/12) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, u.birth)/12) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, u.birth)/12) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' ELSE '50대 이상' END AS age_group, u.gender, t.tag_name, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM takku_user u JOIN takku_order o ON u.user_id = o.user_id JOIN takku_funding f ON o.funding_id = f.funding_id JOIN takku_funding_tag ft ON f.funding_id = ft.funding_id JOIN takku_tag t ON ft.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE o.status = '결제완료' GROUP BY CASE WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, u.birth)/12) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, u.birth)/12) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, u.birth)/12) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, u.birth)/12) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' ELSE '50대 이상' END, u.gender, t.tag_name ) inner_query ) WHERE rn <= 3 ORDER BY age_group, gender, rn
SELECT NVL(SUM(o.amount), 0) FROM takku_order o WHERE o.funding_id = #{fundingId} AND o.status = '결제완료' AND TRUNC(o.purchased_at) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT u.gender AS label, COUNT(*) AS value FROM takku_order o JOIN takku_user u ON o.user_id = u.user_id WHERE o.funding_id = #{fundingId} AND o.status = '결제완료' GROUP BY u.gender

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM takku_order WHERE funding_id = #{fundingId} AND status = '결제완료'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM takku_order WHERE funding_id = #{fundingId} AND status = '환불'

SELECT TO_CHAR(o.purchased_at, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, COUNT(*) AS orderCount, SUM(o.amount) AS revenue FROM takku_order o JOIN takku_funding f ON o.funding_id = f.funding_id WHERE f.product_id = #{productId} AND o.status = '결제완료' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(o.purchased_at, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY month
